title: Scrap Any Website with Source Code Input

url.title: Website URL
url.description: The URL of the website to scrape (must include http:// or https://)

depth.title: Mirror Depth
depth.description: How many links deep to follow (1 = only main page, 2-3 recommended)

stayOnDomain.title: Stay on Same Domain
stayOnDomain.description: Only download content from the same domain

externalDepth.title: External Links Depth
externalDepth.description: How deep to follow external links (0 = don't follow external links)

maxRate.title: Max Download Rate (KB/s)
maxRate.description: Maximum download rate in KB/s (0 = unlimited)

maxSize.title: Max Total Size (MB)
maxSize.description: Maximum total size to download in MB (0 = unlimited)

maxTime.title: Max Time (seconds)
maxTime.description: Maximum scraping time in seconds (0 = unlimited)

retries.title: Retry Attempts
retries.description: Number of retry attempts on error

getImages.title: Download Images
getImages.description: Download image files (jpg, png, gif, etc.)

getVideos.title: Download Videos
getVideos.description: Download video files (mp4, avi, mov, etc.)

outputName.title: Output Name (Optional)
outputName.description: Custom name for output files (leave empty for auto-generated)

cleanup.title: Cleanup After Zipping
cleanup.description: Remove source directory after creating ZIP (saves storage)
